030@MessageProps(
031    opCode=75,
032    size=8,
033    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
034    request=CGMAlertStatusRequest.class
035)
036public class CGMAlertStatusResponse extends NotificationMessage {
037    
038    private BigInteger intMap;
039    
040    public CGMAlertStatusResponse() {}
041    
042    public CGMAlertStatusResponse(long cgmAlertBitmask) {
043        this.cargo = buildCargo(cgmAlertBitmask);
044        this.intMap = BigInteger.valueOf(cgmAlertBitmask);
045        
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * <table border="1">
050     * <caption>Parsed fields for CGMAlertStatusResponse:</caption>
051     * <tr><td><code>intMap</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0)</code></td></tr>
052     * </table>
053     */
054    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
055        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
056        this.cargo = raw;
057        this.intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
058        
059    }
060
061    
062    /**
063     * <table border="1">
064     * <caption>Byte layout for CGMAlertStatusResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
065     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
066     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
067     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
068     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
070     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 4]</code></td></tr>
071     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 5]</code></td></tr>
072     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 6]</code></td></tr>
073     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask) [byte 7]</code></td></tr>
074     * </table>
075     */
076    public static byte[] buildCargo(long cgmAlertBitmask) {
077        return Bytes.combine(
078            Bytes.toUint64(cgmAlertBitmask));
079    }
080    
081    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
082        return intMap;
083    }
084    public long getBitMap() {
085        return intMap.longValue();
086    }
087
088    public Set<CGMAlert> getCgmAlerts() {
089        return CGMAlert.fromBitmask(intMap);
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public int size() {
094        return getCgmAlerts().size();
095    }

163
164        private final int id;
165        CGMAlert(int id) {
166            this.id = id;
167        }
168
169        public int id() {
170            return id;
171        }
172
173        public static Set<CGMAlert> fromBitmask(BigInteger bitmask) {
174            Set<CGMAlert> set = new TreeSet<>();
175            for (CGMAlert a : values()) {
176                if (bitmask.testBit(a.id())) {
177                    set.add(a);
178                }
179            }
180            return set;
181        }
182
183        public static BigInteger toBitmask(CGMAlert ...alerts) {
184            BigInteger i = BigInteger.ZERO;
185            for (CGMAlert a : alerts) {
186                i.setBit(a.id());
187            }
188            return i;
189        }
190    }
